title: Bondi’s #1 Hotel: Ultimate QT Summer Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
The cool vibes of one of the world’s most famous beaches await with a glamorous stay at the ultra-cool QT Bondi, an art-filled retreat located a stone's throw from iconic Bondi Beach. Thanks to its enviable location on Gould Street, you will be able to truly live like a local and enjoy all Bondi has on offer, from perfect waves to fine dining restaurants - before retreating in one of the hotel’s beautifully designed rooms and suites.

Discover why this arty hotel is currently ranked the number one hotel in Bondi on TripAdvisor and embrace the spirit of this hip destination. Enjoy daily breakfast at Parida Bondi, a bottle of wine on arrival and a leisurely late 12pm checkout.

**Travelling with family?** Up to two children aged 11 years and under stay for free, sleeping on a double sofa bed with breakfast included.
offer_address: 6 Beach Rd, Bondi Beach, NSW 2026, Australia

title: QT Luxury at Bondi’s #1 Hotel
description:
Embrace the good vibes of one of the world’s most famous beaches with a boutique stay at the ultra-cool QT Bondi, ranked #1 hotel in Bondi on Tripadvisor. Live like a local and enjoy all this iconic destination has to offer from a luxe launchpad, perfectly located on sought-after Beach Road - just across the road from the sparkling waters and perfect waves of Bondi. With Sydney CBD only a 30-minute drive away, this seaside sanctuary is the ultimate reprieve from the hustle and bustle of city life, yet enviably close for day trips and adventures to see the Opera House, enjoy a tipple amid The Rocks' heritage pubs and admire the history of Sydney Harbour Bridge. 

**Your handpicked inclusions**:

- Delicious daily breakfast
- Toast your escape with a bottle of wine on arrival
- Make the most of complimentary in-room movies
- Sleep in with a leisurely 12pm late checkout
offer_address: 6 Beach Rd, Bondi Beach, NSW 2026, Australia

title: Stylish QT Beachside Retreat in the Heart of Bondi
description: Hang 10 with an escape to super-stylish QT Bondi in Sydney’s iconic Bondi Beach, nestled between buzzing streets, bright sands and balmy Pacific Ocean waves. Live like a local and enjoy everything the world-famous surf spot has to offer from the ultimate launchpad, with complimentary bike and surfboard hire included in every stay. With Sydney’s vibrant CBD only a 30-minute drive away, this seaside sanctuary is enviably close to countless city adventures - explore the Opera House, enjoy a tipple in The Rocks' heritage pubs, admire Sydney Harbour Bridge and much more. When you'd rather stay in and relax, the hotel's extensive room service menu and art-filled interiors make it easy to savour every moment.
offer_address: 6 Beach Rd, Bondi Beach, NSW 2026, Australia
